articles.title: Audi zooms past red light at Lentor Avenue, narrowly misses pedestrian - AsiaOne
articles.description: A woman had a narrow escape when a red Audi came within inches of hitting her at a pedestrian crossing at Lentor Avenue. The incident occurred on Thursday (Dec 30) at 3.31pm at the traffic light before Lentor Residence. A 15-second clip of the incident was up…
articles.content:
A woman had a narrow escape when a red Audi came within inches of hitting her at a pedestrian crossing at Lentor Avenue.

articles.title: 'Memorable for the wrong reasons': Couple's $2.2k Bulgari anniversary ring breaks after falling off table - AsiaOne
